import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './style.css'; export default function ModalCar({carObject, closeHandler, saveChanges}) { const [carChanged, setChanges] = useState( { carManufacturer: (carObject && carObject.car_manufacturer) ? carObject.car_manufacturer : "", carModel: (carObject && carObject.car_model) ? carObject.car_model : "" , carName: (carObject && carObject.car_name) ? carObject.car_name : "", carFuel: (carObject && carObject.car_fuel) ? carObject.car_fuel : "" }) console.log(carChanged); const handleChanges= (event) => { setChanges({carManufacturer: event.target.carManufacturer, carManufacturer: event.target.carManufacturer,carManufacturer: event.target.carManufacturer,carManufacturer: event.target.carManufacturer}) console.log(event.target); } return (

) }; const style = { parentDiv: { backgroundColor: "rgb(163, 163, 163,0.8)", position: "fixed", zIndex: 10, width: "100%", height: "100%", display:"flex", justifyContent: "center", alignItems: "center" }, modalDiv:{ backgroundColor:"#fffafa", width:"50%", height: "50%", position: "relative" }, modalButton:{ fontSize:"15px", backgroundColor:"#ffc9c9", width:"30px", height:"30px", borderRadius: "50%", borderColor: "#ffff", position: "absolute", top:"-4px", right:"-4px", color:"#525252" }, headerModal:{ backgroundColor:"#ff8f8f", display:"flex", justifyContent: "center", alignItems: "center", width:"100%", height: "20%", }, headerModalContent:{ height:"20%", backgroundColor:"#ffffff" }, headerModalText:{ display:"inlineBlock", fontSize:"18px", padding:"10px 2%", justifyContent: "left", fontFamily: "Arial" }, headerInput:{ display:"inline", color:"black", width: "35%", height: "10px" }, headerModalLine:{ backgroundColor: "pink", width: "100%", height: "4px", marginTop: "0px" }, headerButton:{ display:"inline", height:"50px", width:"100px", backgroundColor:"#ff7d7d", color:"#ffffff", border:"none" } };
